BP_EqDescZipLine_C.name: Zipline

Slot: Hand

Provides faster traversal in factories by allowing Pioneers to zip along Power lines.
Activate the Zipline and aim at a nearby Power Line to connect to it.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorBeacon_C.name: Beacon
BP_EquipmentDescriptorBeacon_C.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Used to mark areas of interest. Displayed on your compass with the color and name you set for it.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorGasmask_C.name: Gas Mask
BP_EquipmentDescriptorGasmask_C.description:
Slot: Body

Allows you to breathe normally in poison gas. Consumes Gas Filters from your inventory when you are in poison gas.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorHazmatSuit_C.name: Hazmat Suit
BP_EquipmentDescriptorHazmatSuit_C.description:
Slot: Body

Shields you from the adverse effects of radiation. 
Consumes Iodine Infused Filters from your inventory when you are in radioactive areas.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorHoverPack_C.name: Hover Pack
BP_EquipmentDescriptorHoverPack_C.description:
Slot: Body
Power consumption: 100 MW

Allows for vertical movement and hovering in mid-air to improve building efficiency and factory traversal. Wirelessly connects to nearby power connections, such as Power Poles and Buildings, for power consumption.

Slow-fall: Hold ascend input after losing connection mid-air.
Disable Hoverpack: Double tap descend input while hovering.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorJetPack_C.name: Jetpack
BP_EquipmentDescriptorJetPack_C.description:
Slot: Body

Allows you to move more freely in the air. Consumes Fuel when used and refills with Fuel from your inventory when you're on the ground.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorJumpingStilts_C.name: Blade Runners
BP_EquipmentDescriptorJumpingStilts_C.description:
Slot: Body

An exoskeleton for your lower legs that assists movement, allowing you to sprint faster and jump higher.
Also dampens the impact of landing.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorNobeliskDetonator_.name: Nobelisk Detonator
BP_EquipmentDescriptorNobeliskDetonator_.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Nobelisk

Used to blow up cracked boulders, rocks and invasive vegetation.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorObjectScanner_C.name: Object Scanner
BP_EquipmentDescriptorObjectScanner_C.description:
Slot: Hands

Scans the area for a set item. Beeps at a rate proportional to proximity and direction.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorRifle_C.name: Rifle
BP_EquipmentDescriptorRifle_C.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Rifle Cartridges

Rapid-firing weapon for self-defense.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorShockShank_C.description:

Desc_AluminumPlate_C.description: Thin, lightweight, and highly durable sheets that are mainly used for products that require high heat conduction or a high specific strength.

Desc_AluminumScrap_C.name: Aluminum Scrap
Desc_AluminumScrap_C.description: Aluminum Scrap is pure aluminum refined from Alumina. Can be smelted down to Aluminum Ingots for industrial usage.

Desc_CircuitBoard_C.name: Circuit Board
Desc_CircuitBoard_C.description: Circuit Boards are advanced electronics that are used in a plethora of different ways.

(Patterns can be purchased in the AWESOME Shop.)

Desc_CopperDust_C.name: Copper Powder
Desc_CopperDust_C.description:
Ground down Copper Ingots.
The high natural density of Copper, combined with the granularity of the powder, make this part fit for producing Nuclear Pasta in the Particle Accelerator.

Used for crafting.

Desc_CrystalShard_C.name: Power Shard
Desc_CrystalShard_C.description:
Mucus from the power slugs compressed into a solid crystal-like shard. 
It radiates a strange power.

Merry FICSMAS and a Happy New Year!

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!

Desc_Fireworks_Projectile_03_C.name: Sparkly Fireworks

You have now officially ascended. 
Go forth now, Master of Spaghetti, God of the Factory, Sinker of Cups, Employee of the Planet... travel in STYLE!

Now with special - FICSIT Foundation only - Grip Wheels, for an even smoother and faster factory floor experience!

Desc_NonFissibleUranium_C.name: Non-fissile Uranium
Desc_NonFissibleUranium_C.description:
The isotope Uranium-238 is non-fissile, meaning it cannot be used for nuclear fission. It can, however, be conversed into fissile Plutonium in the Particle Accelerator.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

Desc_NuclearFuelRod_C.name: Uranium Fuel Rod
Desc_NuclearFuelRod_C.description:
Used as fuel for the Nuclear Power Plant.

Caution: Produces radioactive Uranium Waste when consumed.
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_NuclearWaste_C.name: Uranium Waste
Desc_NuclearWaste_C.description:
The by-product of consuming Uranium Fuel Rods in the Nuclear Power Plant.
Non-fissible Uranium can be extracted. Handle with caution.

Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

Desc_Nut_C.name: Beryl Nut
Desc_Nut_C.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore half a health segment.

Desc_OreBauxite_C.description: Bauxite is used to produce Alumina, which can be further refined into the Aluminum Scrap required to produce Aluminum Ingots.

Desc_OreCopper_C.name: Copper Ore

Consumable

Desc_PetroleumCoke_C.name: Petroleum Coke
Desc_PetroleumCoke_C.description:
Used for crafting.
A carbon-rich material distilled from Heavy Oil Residue. 
Used as a less efficient coal replacement or for aluminum refinement.

Desc_Plastic_C.name: Plastic
Desc_Plastic_C.description: A versatile and easy to manufacture material that can be used for a lot of things.

Desc_PlutoniumCell_C.name: Encased Plutonium Cell
Desc_PlutoniumCell_C.description:
Plutonium Cells are concrete encased Plutonium Pellets.
Used to produce Plutonium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_PlutoniumFuelRod_C.name: Plutonium Fuel Rod
Desc_PlutoniumFuelRod_C.description:
Used as fuel for the Nuclear Power Plant.

Caution: Produces radioactive Plutonium Waste when consumed.
Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

Desc_PlutoniumPellet_C.name: Plutonium Pellet
Desc_PlutoniumPellet_C.description:
Produced in the Particle Accelerator through conversion of Non-fissile Uranium.
Used to produce Encased Plutonium Cells for Plutonium Fuel Rods.

Power Usage: 250-750 MW (500 MW average).
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_PlutoniumWaste_C.name: Plutonium Waste
Desc_PlutoniumWaste_C.description:
The by-product of consuming Plutonium Fuel Rods in the Nuclear Power Plant.
Needs to be stored in a safe location. Handle with caution.

Caution: EXTREMELY Radioactive.

Desc_PolymerResin_C.name: Polymer Resin
Desc_PolymerResin_C.description:
Used for crafting.
A by-product of oil refinement into fuel. Commonly used to manufacture plastics.

Desc_PressureConversionCube_C.name: Pressure Conversion Cube
Desc_PressureConversionCube_C.description: Converts outgoing force into internal pressure. Required to contain unstable, high-energy matter.

Desc_QuartzCrystal_C.name: Quartz Crystal
Desc_QuartzCrystal_C.description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Used in the production of advanced radar technology and high-quality display screens.

Desc_RawQuartz_C.name: Raw Quartz
Desc_RawQuartz_C.description: Raw Quartz can be processed into Quartz Crystals and Silica, which both offer a variety of applications.

Desc_RebarGunProjectile_C.name: Rebar Gun
Desc_RebarGunProjectile_C.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Spiked Rebar

Improvised ranged weapon for self defense. Has to be reloaded after each use.

Desc_ResourceSinkCoupon_C.name: FICSIT Coupon
Desc_ResourceSinkCoupon_C.description: A special FICSIT bonus program Coupon, obtained through the AWESOME Sink. Can be redeemed in the AWESOME Shop for bonus milestones and rewards

Desc_Rotor_C.name: Rotor
Desc_Rotor_C.description:

Desc_Rubber_C.name: Rubber

Slot: Hands
Consumable

Desc_Silica_C.description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Commonly used to create glass structures, advanced refinement processes, and alternative production of electronics.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_4_C.name: Modular Engine
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_4_C.description: Project Part #4. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_5_C.name: Adaptive Control Unit
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_5_C.description: Project Part #5. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_6_C.name: Magnetic Field Generator
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_6_C.description:
Project Part #7. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

These modular generators use superconducting magnets and vast amounts of electricity to produce an easily expandable and powerful magnetic field.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_7_C.name: Assembly Director System
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_7_C.description:
Project Part #6. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

This extremely fast and precise computing system is specifically designed to direct the Project Assembly: Assembly Phase.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_8_C.name: Thermal Propulsion Rocket
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_8_C.description:
Project Part #8. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Uses extreme heat to produce the high pressure plasma required to get Project Assembly into motion.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_9_C.name: Nuclear Pasta
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_9_C.description:
Project Part #9. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).

Nuclear Pasta is extremely dense degenerate matter, formed when extreme pressure forces protons and electrons together into neutrons. It is theorized to exist naturally within the crust of neutron stars.

Desc_Stator_C.name: Stator
Desc_Stator_C.description:
Used for crafting.
The static parts of a motor.

Desc_SteelIngot_C.name: Steel Ingot
Desc_SteelIngot_C.description: Steel Ingots are made from Iron Ore that's been smelted with Coal. They are made into several parts used in building construction.

Desc_SteelPipe_C.name: Steel Pipe
Desc_SteelPipe_C.description: Steel Pipes are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

Desc_SteelPlateReinforced_C.name: Encased Industrial Beam
Desc_SteelPlateReinforced_C.description:
Encased Industrial Beams utilizes the compressive strength of concrete and tensile strength of steel simultaneously.
Mostly used as a stable basis for constructing buildings.

Desc_SteelPlate_C.name: Steel Beam
Desc_SteelPlate_C.description: Steel Beams are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

Desc_Stone_C.name: Limestone
Desc_Stone_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for stable foundations.

Desc_Sulfur_C.name: Sulfur
Desc_Sulfur_C.description: Sulfur is primarily used for Black Powder.

Desc_SulfuricAcid_C.name: Sulfuric Acid
Desc_SulfuricAcid_C.description: A mineral acid produced by combining Sulfur and Water in a complex reaction. Primarily used in refinement processes and Battery production.

Desc_TurboFuel_C.name: Packaged Turbofuel
Desc_TurboFuel_C.description: Turbofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Desc_UraniumCell_C.name: Encased Uranium Cell
Desc_UraniumCell_C.description:
Uranium Cells are produced from Uranium Ore. 
Used to produce Uranium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

Desc_Wire_C.name: Wire
Desc_Wire_C.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Desc_Wood_C.name: Wood
Desc_Wood_C.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

special__sinkPoint.name: Sink point
special__sinkPoint.description: A special FICSIT bonus program Coupon, obtained through the AWESOME Sink. Can be redeemed in the AWESOME Shop for bonus milestones and rewards
